events.message: I ordered a jacket last week but it doesn't fit at all. I want to return it and get my money back.
The case has been categorized as a refund request based on the customer's mention of returning the product for money back.
The case is assigned to agent Emily for handling the refund request.
Hello! I understand you want to return the jacket and receive a refund. I'm here to help you with that.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket is unused with tags still attached?
Sure, the order number is 123456789. The jacket is brand new and the tags are still on it.
Thank you for the information. You can return the jacket within 14 days for a full refund. I will send you the return shipping label shortly.
Thanks for the quick response! I appreciate you sending the shipping label, that makes it easy for me.
I've emailed you the shipping label, and once we receive the returned jacket, your refund will be processed within 5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm that you successfully returned the jacket and to see if you have received your refund yet.
Yes, I returned the jacket yesterday and I already received the full refund. Thanks for your help!
We are closing your case now. Thank you for your cooperation and please reach out if you need assistance in the future.
